exercises.name: Hamstring Stretch
exercises.description: Sit on the floor with one leg extended straight and reach towards your toes, keeping your back straight.

exercises.name: Calf Stretch
exercises.description: Stand facing a wall with one foot forward and one foot back. Lean into the wall, keeping the back leg straight, to stretch the calf muscles.

exercises.name: Deep Squats
exercises.description: Perform deep squats to improve flexibility in the hips, knees, and ankles.

exercises.name: Shoulder Stretch
exercises.description: Extend one arm across your chest and gently pull it towards your body with the opposite hand.

exercises.name: Triceps Stretch
exercises.description: Bring one arm overhead and bend the elbow, reaching your hand down your back. Use the opposite hand to gently push on the bent elbow.

exercises.name: Wrist Flexor Stretch
exercises.description: Extend one arm with the palm facing down, gently pulling the fingers towards your body with the opposite hand.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.description: Get on your hands and knees, arch your back up towards the ceiling (cat), then lower it down and lift your head and tailbone towards the ceiling (cow).

exercises.name: Side Planks
exercises.description: Hold a side plank on each side to strengthen and stretch the obliques.

exercises.name: Seated Twist
exercises.description: Sit on the floor, cross one leg over the other, and twist your torso to the side, placing the opposite elbow outside the bent knee.

exercises.name: Dynamic Lunges
exercises.description: Perform dynamic lunges to engage the muscles in your legs and hips.

exercises.name: Dynamic Arm Swings
exercises.description: Swing your arms in circular motions to improve flexibility in the shoulders and upper back.

exercises.name: Full Body Stretch
exercises.description: Finish with a full-body stretch, reaching towards the sky and lengthening your entire body.

exercises.name: Single Leg Balancing
exercises.description: Stand on one leg and hold for 30 seconds, then switch to the other leg.

exercises.name: Ankle Circles
exercises.description: Rotate your ankles in circular motions to improve ankle flexibility and stability.

exercises.name: Balance Board Exercises
exercises.description: Incorporate balance board exercises to enhance overall stability.

exercises.name: Rest Day
exercises.description: Take a day off from structured exercise to allow your body to recover and repair.
